Name: Juana De La Cruz
description:
Juana is 51 years old, and she lives in her own house with her son and her two grandchildren, ages 13 and 10.  Juana sells a variety of clothing and she also cultivates corn, which allows her to earn a living for her family.  

Because she wants to improve her living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to repair and expand the covered walkway of her home.  She also wants to improve the floor of the house.  

With the requested amount, she will purchase cement, sand, gravel, galvanized sheeting, pillars, iron, and similar items.
